data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.                                                                                                                                                           
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=rXRY1mBF0egQ7kNvgGe_HME&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AUAyKLJLa3p6f_97pk4ArgG&oh=00_AYBLlMenCy4sjzy9unomZPJqJvwcsr7GSmxK9UmJevWFZA&oe=66E96637)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=9fSXaMQJzCMQ7kNvgGV2GnN&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AUAyKLJLa3p6f_97pk4ArgG&oh=00_AYBQhshcMtcDS0Lf6QLARCDXgk6KLDwZJsVtggnKdt49Rg&oe=66E973D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=brmUXc2Qm3UQ7kNvgEgB587&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AUAyKLJLa3p6f_97pk4ArgG&oh=00_AYAiuhtxz6BflZpRRYaTF9W8J8WNQ9kZVhFN7Iybs0sxLA&oe=66E95F09)
